summary: To secure a position where I can utilize my skills, work ethic, achievement where we it can be an asset to your company. Highlights Knowledge of Windows Microsoft Word, PowerPoint & Excel and Internet Explorer hair stylist and makeup stylist.

experience.title: Lead Teacher
experience.description: Promoted good behaviors by using the positive reinforcement method. Maintained daily records of children's individual activities, behaviors, meals and naps. Assigned to work with academic education director to provide and maintain a positive and appropriate educational program that meets the social, emotional, physical, and intellectual needs of the children within my care. Established a safe play environment for the children. Accomplishments During my time at this job i have learned to understand children at different age group, and how they function as their brain developed and interact with their peers.

experience.title: Passenger Service
experience.description: Greet passengers and check documents Input passengers information into the computer Checked baggage and collected baggage charges. Printed itineraries and tickets for an average of 30 passengers per flight. check in passengers for flight resevations Escort first and business class passengers to lounge Check and scan boarding pass before passengers board the plane

experience.title: Teachers Aide
experience.description: Assigned to work one and one with child that has autism. Assistant to the one and one with his/her academic needs as well as toiletries. Do daily activities that are random for him/her to get acquainted withe the lesson/task

experience.title: Direct Support Professional
experience.description: check communication log for appointments and daily goals for service recipients. Read Record and share observation with other members of the team. Respect the rights of the service recipients and teach them to speak up for themselves. Selected and compiled relevant information and resources for clients to support them in overcoming mental and emotional problems. Supported residential clients in completing tasks such as toileting, brushing teeth and general hygiene. Acted as a role model for clients by exhibiting positive behaviors.
